contributors: Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. Board of Foreign Missions. Library, former owner.
item.title: [Unidentified Persian treatise on the Miʻrāj and several other topics from the Hadith]
notes: Paper: beige laid paper with no visible chain-lines or watermarks; elaborate unwan which lacks a title; text enclosed in ruled border in blue, gold and red ink; black ink with rubrication; catchwords rectos of most pages.
Nastaʻliq; 13 lines in written area 16.5 x 7.3 cm.
Label pasted on inside front cover: Library of the Board of Foreign Missions of the Presbyterian Church of the U.S.A., 156 Fifth Avenue, New York, Book: P 3 T, Class: 727.1; For: Reference.
Library of Congress. Persian manuscript, M59.
Contemporary dark brown leather binding; lacks spine, front and back covers loose.
Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress website.
Incipit: فصل در بيان برون خواجه عالم عليه الصلوة والسلم از مكه به بيت المقدس ...
summary: Treatise on the Miʻrāj, and several other doctrines from the Hadith of the Prophet Muḥammad.
medium: 197 leaves (13 lines), paper : partially disbound ; 21.3 x 12 cm

contributor: presbyterian church in the u.s.a. board of foreign missions. library
